definition[0]: an area in outer space into which everything near it, including light, is pulled
definition[1]: something that uses up a lot of money

definition[2]: a business activity or product on which large amounts of money are spent, but that does not produce any income or other useful result
example[1]: Anyone who launches a bid for the company will want to be sure there are no more black holes lurking in its books.
